text: tena niriksako manavini agala-pachala niyukata che, je allahana adesathi tenum niriksana kare che, ko'i komani sthiti allaha ta'ala nathi badalato, jyam sudhi ke te pote tene na badale, je temana hrdayomam che, allaha ta'ala jyare ko'i komane yatana apavano nisvaya kari le che, to te badalato nathi ane tena sivaya temani madada karanara ko'i nathi
